title: Isekai NTR – Having a Secret Harem - Novel Updates
tags: Ability Steal   Adapted to Manga   Antihero Protagonist   Betrayal   Brainwashing   Corruption   Cruel Characters   Demi-Humans   Distrustful Protagonist   Emotionally Weak Protagonist   Fantasy World   First-time Interc**rse   Friends Become Enemies   Game Elements   Hated Protagonist   Heroes   Hiding True Abilities   Male Protagonist   Manipulative Characters   Master-Disciple Relationship   Multiple POV   Multiple Reincarnated Individuals   Netori   Overpowered Protagonist   R-18   R*pe Victim Becomes Lover   Reincarnated in a Game World   R*pe   Ruthless Protagonist   Saving the World   Sister Complex   S*aves   Strong to Stronger   Threesome   Time Travel   Transported to Another World   Weak to Strong
author: Gorirandou   五里蘭堂
description:
I am definitely going to escape this shitty Isekai game world.

And its going to be with him.

However, there are too many woman who are trying to disturb us currently.

And it would be a problem if he was to get too attached to a woman and lose his reason to clear this shitty game.

So—Let’s start by removing those distractions, shall we?>
